overview:
Aaron Lee is a proven entrepreneur and innovator. He directed merchant integration engineering at PayPal, launching many APIs and successful partnerships and has co-founded other startups including DriveDev, Supermegaphone, and Dataradar. He consulted for enterprise businesses such as Dell, EOTT, Dynegy, and PayPal. He is currently a board member at DriveDev and an advisor to Medpayonline.com. Aaron studied Electrical Engineering at Texas A&M.

He is currently pursuing certification as an aircraft mechanic and builder, so that he can build the plane he’s been designing since childhood.
